mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY WHERE seller_id = #{userId} OR buyer_id = #{userId}

SELECT CH.trade_id , CH.trade_item_id , CH.trade_suggest_id , CASE WHEN CH.seller_id = #{userId} THEN CH.buyer_id ELSE CH.seller_id END AS opponent_user_id , U.nickname AS opponent_user_nickname , CASE WHEN CH.seller_id = #{userId} THEN TI.type ELSE TS.type END AS type , CH.gacha_id , G.title AS gacha_title , TS.purchase_item_id , GI_P.name AS purchase_item_name , TS.purchase_original_price , TS.purchase_discount_yn , TS.purchase_discount_price , TS.exchange_seller_item_id , GI_E1.name AS exchange_item_name , TS.exchange_original_item_id , TS.exchange_suggested_item_id , GI_E2.name AS exchange_suggested_item_name , TS.exchange_change_yn , CH.completed_at AS trade_completed_at , CASE WHEN TUC.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS compliment_yn FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY CH INNER JOIN TRADE_ITEM TI ON TI.id = CH.trade_item_id INNER JOIN TRADE_SUGGEST TS ON TS.id = CH.trade_suggest_id INNER JOIN GACHA G ON G.id = CH.gacha_id INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = (CASE WHEN CH.seller_id = #{userId} THEN CH.buyer_id ELSE CH.seller_id END) LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_P ON GI_P.id = TS.purchase_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E1 ON GI_E1.id = TS.exchange_seller_item_id LEFT JOIN GACHA_ITEM GI_E2 ON GI_E2.id = TS.exchange_suggested_item_id LEFT JOIN TRADE_USER_COMPLIMENT TUC ON TUC.trade_suggest_id = CH.trade_suggest_id AND TUC.compliment_user_id = #{userId} WHERE CH.seller_id = #{userId} OR buyer_id = #{userId}
